thread.title: FREE Nighty Night Bedtime Story App (iOS & Android)
thread.title_full: FREE Nighty Night Bedtime Story App (iOS & Android)

author: Angela (Super Saver Sidekick)
title: FREE Nighty Night Bedtime Story App (iOS & Android)
text:
Having trouble getting your kiddos to sleep at night? Head on over to iTunes or the Google Play Store where you can score the Nighty Night Bedtime Story App for FREE (regularly $2.99).
Watching all the animals go to sleep is a lovely way to set the mood for bedtime. The interactive bedtime “Nighty Night” is brought to you from Oscar-Nominee Heidi Wittlinger (2002, best animated short) who put a lot of passion and effort in constructing little sets made of paper and combining them with 2D illustration and animation.
